fields.text_html:
Welcome

This is an experiment in decision-making. You will earn money based on the decisions you and others make in the experiment. We will pay you at the end of the session.

You are one of #number_of_players# participants in this session. We have assigned you the ID "#player_id_label#".

The session has #part_count# parts, each part has #period_count# periods.

Each part is independent of the other #part_count-1# parts.

In each part, your earnings do not depend on the earnings or choices in the other #part_count-1# parts.

Before each part begins, we will give you instructions explaining how it works.

Continue to the next page of the instructions by pressing the Next  button in the bottom right corner of this frame.

Part #current_part#

Part #current_part# has two steps. In Step 1, the computer will show the same image to everyone in the experiment. This image is at the top of the frame below.

Possible images:

#outcome_images#

The image can be either #outcome_name_list#. Everyone in the session sees the same image.

In Step 2, shown at the bottom of the frame below, you must report either #outcome_name_list#. To do so, click one of the images and press the Report button at the bottom of the frame.

Everyone in the session will repeat the following process #period_count# times in this part. First, the computer will show everyone one of the possible images, and then everyone makes a report.

Continue to the next page of the instructions.

Part #current_part#

In Part #current_part# we have put everyone into new groups. Your group has the following members: #group_list#.

Part two has two steps. In Step 1, the computer will show the same image to everyone in your group. This image is at the top of the frame below. Everyone in your group also has a label. Both the image at the top of the frame and your group's labels are one of the possible images below.

#outcome_images#

The image and labels can be either #outcome_name_list#. Everyone in your group sees the same image. Everyone in your group sees the same labels.

In Step 2, shown at bottom of the frame below, you must report either #outcome_name_list#. To do so, click one of the images and press the Report button at the bottom of the frame.

Everyone in your group will repeat the following process #period_count# times in this part. First, the computer will show everyone one of the possible images and labels, and then everyone in your group makes a report. Your group will not change during this part.

Continue to the next page of the instructions.

Part #current_part# Earnings

We will randomly pay you for one of the periods in this part.

Periods in this part have two possible earnings outcomes. 

  1. If your label is in the majority reported by your group in the paid period, you earn $#pay_label_majority#.
  2. If your label is not in the majority, you instead earn $#pay_label_minority#.

For your label to be in the majority, it must match at least #minimum_for_majority-1# other report(s).

You will not see the results for this part until the end of the experiment.

At the end of the experiment, one of the participants will roll a #period_count# sided die to determine which period is paid. Everyone in the experiment is paid for the same period in this part.

If you have a question, please raise your hand, and someone will help you.

This is the end of the instructions. If you are finished with the instructions, please click the Start   button located in the bottom right of this frame. The instructions will remain on your screen until the experiment begins. We need everyone to click the  Start   button before we can begin the experiment.

Part #current_part#

In Part #current_part# we have put everyone into new groups. Your group has the following members: #group_list#.

Part two has two steps. In Step 1, the computer will show the same image to everyone in your group. This image is at the top of the frame below. Everyone in your group also has a label. Both the image at the top of the frame and your group's labels are one of the possible images below.

#outcome_images#

The image and labels can be either #outcome_name_list#. Everyone in your group sees the same image. Everyone in your group sees the same labels.

In Step 2, shown at bottom of the frame below, you must report either #outcome_name_list#. To do so, click one of the images and press the Report button at the bottom of the frame.

Everyone in your group will repeat the following process #period_count# times in this part. First, the computer will show everyone one of the possible images and labels, and then everyone in your group makes a report. Your group will not change during this part.

Continue to the next page of the instructions.

Part #current_part# Earnings

We will randomly pay you for one of the periods in this part.

Periods in this part have two possible earnings outcomes. 

  1. If your label is in the majority reported by your group in the paid period, you earn $#pay_label_majority#.
  2. If your label is not in the majority, you instead earn $#pay_label_minority#.

Additionally if your report is in the majority, you earn an extra $#pay_choice_majority#.

For your label to be in the majority, it must match at least #minimum_for_majority-1# other report(s).

You will not see the results for this part until the end of the experiment.

At the end of the experiment, one of the participants will roll a #period_count# sided die to determine which period is paid. Everyone in the experiment is paid for the same period in this part.

If you have a question, please raise your hand, and someone will help you.

This is the end of the instructions. If you are finished with the instructions, please click the Start   button located in the bottom right of this frame. The instructions will remain on your screen until the experiment begins. We need everyone to click the  Start   button before we can begin the experiment.

Part #current_part# Earnings

You have two possible earnings outcomes for this part. 

  1. If all #period_count# of your reports are in the majority or reports in every period in this part, you earn $#pay_choice_majority#.
  2. If one or more of your #period_count# reports in this part is not in the majority, you instead earn $#pay_choice_minority#.

For your report to be in the majority, it must match at least #minimum_for_majority-1# other reports.

If you have a question, please raise your hand, and someone will help you.

This is the end of the instructions. If you are finished with the instructions, please click the Start   button located in the bottom right of this frame. The instructions will remain on your screen until the experiment begins. We need everyone to click the  Start   button before we can begin the experiment.
